The '''Raiden Shogun''' is an alias associated with the Electro Archon, which may refer to:

* [[Raiden Shogun]], the playable character
* [[Ei]] (Beelzebul), the current deity
* [[Makoto]] (Baal), the former deity who used this title
* [[The Shogun]], the puppet

It can also refer to the following domains:
* [[Plane of Euthymia]], the [[Archon Quest]] story domain
* [[End of the Oneiric Euthymia]], the [[Trounce Domain]]
